description: Adds a partner integration to a cluster. This operation authorizes a partner to push status updates for the specified database. To complete the integration, you also set up the integration on the partner website.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The cluster identifier of the cluster that receives data from the partner.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database that receives data from the partner.

parameters.name: PartnerName
parameters.description: The name of the partner that is authorized to send data.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database that receives data from the partner.

nested_items.name: PartnerName
nested_items.description: The name of the partner that is authorized to send data.
